structure.unit: HOTEL, FOOD SERVICE, AND MOBILE HOME AND RECREATIONAL VEHICLE PARK REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Trust and agency fund -- Expenditure of funds.
law.text: All fees collected by the cabinet under the provisions of KRS 219.011 to 219.081 shall be paid into the State Treasury and credited to a trust and agency fund to be used by the cabinet in defraying the costs and expenses of the cabinet in the administration of KRS 219.011 to 219.081. Such funds may be expended for training of state and local sanitation personnel. The balance of this fund shall revert to the general funds of the Commonwealth at the end of each biennium.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 247, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 337, sec. 8.
